bug: Off-by-one error in filterEven() loop condition.
reason: The loop iterates up to and including dataList.size(), which is one element beyond the valid index range of the list, leading to an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException.

bug: Assignment operator used instead of equality operator in containsValue().
reason: The code uses '=' for comparison instead of '==' which is the assignment operator. This will cause a compilation error.
